snippet.title: Merge empires (by FuryLion) - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the most addictive game on your phone! Build your own empires, choose the smartest strategy to defeat bosses!

FEATURES:
•Merge buildings to discover new heroes and ages.
•Variety of objects, heroes and bosses. There are more than 50 kinds of buildings, different heroes and epic bosses!
•Idle system. Your civilization grows automatically, even if you are offline.
•Compete with friends and players from all over the world in leaderboard to get unique rewards.

Merge, build, and develop to be greatest ruler of your civilizations!!

Price:Free
Play Store Download link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.furylion.mergeempires
